definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
Indochina/also written 中南半島|中南半岛[Zhong1 nan2 Ban4 dao3]

sentences.english: Today, our relations stand at a new starting point in history.
sentences.chinese: 楊潔篪最後說，中印關係正站在一個新的歷史起點上。

sentences.english: The Mon and Pyu kingdoms were an active overland trade route between India and China.
sentences.chinese: 孟國和驃國是中印兩國間橫跨大陸的活躍的通商之道。

sentences.english: Currently, bilateral relations are developing very well.
sentences.chinese: 當前，中印關係發展很好。

sentences.english: But, this competition is met in promoting, imprint two countries redoubles his efforts.
sentences.chinese: 可是，這場競爭會促成中印兩國加倍盡力。

sentences.english: Anyone who has been to both countries, however, can see that this survey is bogus.
sentences.chinese: 不過，去過中印兩國的人都知道，這項調查是假的。

sentences.english: The RDE global challengers' rapid growth is far from over.
sentences.chinese: 中印兩國全球挑戰者的快速成長還遠沒有結束。

sentences.english: Have they made any progress in advancing China-India relations?
sentences.chinese: 在促進中印關係發展方面取得哪些進展？

sentences.english: China and India share broad common interest in climate change.
sentences.chinese: 中印在氣候變化領域有着廣泛的共同利益。

sentences.english: They dont want good sino-india ties.
sentences.chinese: 他們不想要中印關係友好。

sentences.english: China's position on the disputed east section of the China-India boundary area is consistent.
sentences.chinese: 中方對中印邊界東段爭議區的立場是一貫的。

sentences.english: Operation ICHIGO provoked a major crisis in the China-Burma-India theater.
sentences.chinese: 一號作戰是中印緬戰區遭遇的一個重大危機。

sentences.english: This will be a stabilizing force in Indian-Chinese relations.
sentences.chinese: 這將成爲中印關係正常化的定心丸。

sentences.english: This week's Sino-Indian military exercises are aimed at defusing some of this tension.
sentences.chinese: 這個星期的中印軍事演習旨在緩和雙邊緊張關係。

sentences.english: This year marks the 60th anniversary of China-India relations.
The two sides exchanged views on the China-India boundary question and expounded their respective positions.
sentences.chinese: 雙方就中印邊界問題交換了意見，闡述了各自立場。

sentences.english: That is why the secular trend in China-India relations is positive.
sentences.chinese: 這正是爲什麼中印關係的現實性趨勢是正面的。

definition: Line of Actual Control (LAC), separating Indian-controlled territory from Chinese-controlled territory
the Chinese side (in an international venture)
